title: Define System Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the SwarmDroneTechnology system, including performance, scalability, security, operational requirements, and integration with existing systems or external services.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components for drone control, swarm coordination, communication, and user interfaces.

title: Develop Drone Control Module
description: Implement the software module responsible for controlling individual drones, including flight control, sensor data processing, and communication with the swarm coordination module.

title: Develop Swarm Coordination Module
description: Implement the software module responsible for coordinating the swarm of drones, including task allocation, path planning, and collision avoidance.

title: Develop Communication Module
description: Implement the software module responsible for secure and reliable communication between drones, the swarm coordination module, and the user interfaces.

title: Develop User Interfaces
description: Design and implement user interfaces for monitoring and controlling the swarm of drones, including visualization of drone positions, sensor data, and mission planning.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect the system from unauthorized access, data breaches, and cyber attacks, including encryption, authentication, and access control mechanisms.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environment
description: Set up the development and testing environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Design and implement a comprehensive test suite for the SwarmDroneTechnology system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create technical documentation for the SwarmDroneTechnology system, including architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user manuals.
